item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Unboxing – Our review console has arrived!
item.content:encoded:
https://www.thesixthaxis.com/2025/06/04/nintendo-switch-2-unboxing-our-review-console-has-arrived/

Our review Nintendo Switch 2 console has arrived a day ahead of the full launch of Nintendo’s new generation of console, and we’ve put together a quick unboxing video.

In this video, the Switch 2 itself is taken out of the cardboard box, we check out the new dock and Joy-Con 2 magnets. There’s also the Switch 2 Pro Controller and the Switch 2 Camera as well. And we stack it up alongside all the previous variants of the first Nintendo Switch.

Sadly no cat this time – he was sleeping.

Stay tuned for all our ongoing Switch 2 coverage. We’ll get right to work on our review of Mario Kart World and Welcome Tour, there’s the Switch 2 Editions of Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom, patches for ARMS, Pokémon Scarlet & Violet, and 3rd party ports of Cyberpunk 2077, Hitman… and plenty more!
